abstract: Ousting their chief executives and multi-billion dollar write-offs weren’t the only thing that Citigroup and Merrill Lynch had in common in 2007. The two banks were the world’s top underwriters of stocks and bonds, measured by volume and reported fees, despite being at the epicenter of the global credit crisis.
lead_paragraph: Ousting their chief executives and multi-billion dollar write-offs weren’t the only thing that Citigroup and Merrill Lynch had in common in 2007. The two banks were the world’s top underwriters of stocks and bonds, measured by volume and reported fees, despite being at the epicenter of the global credit crisis.

headline.main: Citi and Merrill Top Underwriting League Tables
